Text: The install fails every time 'bout half way thru. Dont waste your time. When the install freezes it appears that it is trying to access sensitive registry files so its good that it freezes. *WARNING*

It works pretty well. 

As for the stopping half way through install problem you should try disabling your antiviral software, it tries to run a silent install (at least thats what My NOD AV said)

Thanks for the Gr8 Upload rahulro

This is a great app to do many things. My main use is to convert an avi to an iso.

The cracked worked perfectly but it all of a sudden the crack stopped working.

I uninstalled, reinstalled and recracked and still not working when I had done this in the past where it did work. 

It's a great program, but unfortunately the crack no longer works.
